means: （十七世纪流行的）铁圈球运动，铁圈球场运动，伦敦的街名

sentence.Network_en: The Pall Mall pavement was deserted ; the very red - jackets had gone out of town.
sentence.Network_cn: 蓓尔美尔街上冷冷清清,有身份的人都走了.

sentence.Network_en: He may say what he likes; I don't care a pall Mall.
sentence.Network_cn: 他要说什么随他说去, 我不在乎.

sentence.Network_en: A pall of oily black smoke drifted over the cliff-top.
sentence.Network_cn: 一团油腻的黑色烟雾飘到悬崖顶上。

derivation.yuyuan_name: from obsolete French pallemaille, from Italian pallamaglio, from palla 'ball' + maglio 'mallet'

means.word_mean: 1. a 17th century game; a wooden ball was driven along an alley with a mallet
